description:
Wind can take a hike with this jacket. Providing a wind-proof shell at the front and a breathable back, keeping you protected and cool during those high intensity workouts. Add in stretchy fabric under the arms and elastic cuffs to make these like a second skin to protect you from the elements.

  • A 3-layer softshell has a laminated TPU membrane to keep you dry, while optimizing breathability, allowing you to perform at your best on the ski tracks or in the forest
  • Ventilated stretch material under the arms and back help the sweat escape and providing free movement
  • Bionic Finish Eco® technology sheds light rain or flurries
  • The full zip gives you the coverage you need when out in the ever-changing weather
  • Chin guard adds comfort
  • Easily adjustable waist and elasticated cuffs are super comfortable for long days in the tracks
  • 2 side zippered pockets are great for your essentials or just to warm your hands up
name: B Daehlie Cross Jacket - Women's
